item.title: Report X-2023090892
item.description:
Report X-2023090892

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found wet on load side A209. The contents cap was loose ,causing internal leakage. Absorbent pads was used to clean up spill. DescribePack: Upon inspection of the package, I discovered that one of the contents caps was loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Absorbent pads was used to clean up spill.
